body: I don't know why this series and Niizuma no Sodate Kata is missing volumes for so long, they are so good :/

I love this series, I know there are 2 volumes more, the 5th was released in July, so considering that each volumen has 5 episodes and now we are in December 2021, maybe we will see another volume in January or February, or maybe the 5th was the last one, but idk, I haven't found the raws, and I just bought the first 4 volumes, next year I will buy the 5th one, so maybe I will comment again (if I remember lol) what happened, see ya
TRANSLATE FOR THE LOVE OF GOD
